pageProduct.name: Orzene Keratin Power Shampoo 400ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Orzene Beer Keratin Power shampoo helps the restoration of damaged hair thanks to Keratin repair system, a specially developed system with yeast extract & keratin.
Enriched with Shine Elixir consisting of Beer, Ceramides and Phytoprotein  hydrates hair, enhances elasticity and shine, leaving hair with an airy feeling.

Ingredients

Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Laureth-11 Carboxylate, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Alcohol Denat., Beer, Benzophenone-4, Calcium Gluconate, Ceramide NG, Citric Acid, Faex Extract, Gluconolactone, Glycerin, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch, Linoleamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, Magnesium Chloride, Magnesium Nitrate, Panthenol, PEG-4 Rapeseedamide, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Polysorbate 20, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Sulfate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Benzoic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, CI 14700, CI 47005, CI 61570.

Directions

Apply on wet hair and massage gently. Rinse thoroughly and repeat if necessary. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water.
